mapper.sql: id, file_name, file_md_name, file_type, file_path, file_url, file_size, file_describe, is_deleted, created_time, created_by
mapper.select: select id, file_name as fileName, file_md_name as fileMdName, file_type as fileType, file_path as filePath, file_url as fileUrl, file_size as fileSize, file_describe as fileDescribe, DATE_FORMAT(created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createdTime, created_by as createdBy from file where is_deleted = 0 and file_describe = 'Image-public' order by created_time desc

select id, file_name as fileName, file_md_name as fileMdName, file_type as fileType, file_path as filePath, file_url as fileUrl, file_size as fileSize, file_describe as fileDescribe, DATE_FORMAT(created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createdTime, created_by as createdBy from file where is_deleted = 0 and file_describe = #{fileDescribe} and created_by = #{userId} order by created_time desc
